website_summaries.verdict: A beautiful mineral powder by a company that's known for using top-quality ingredients as well as its cruelty-free pledge.
pros: Micronized mineral foundation in pressed form provides natural-looking coverage that feels lightweight
cons: While it provides excellent coverage for most skin flaws, it may not be full enough for major lines or blemishes

customer_reviews.title: If there is an explanation as to why this happened I am happy to hear about this
customer_reviews.text: I am confused. Did I buy a used compact refil? I don’t know if this came from the amazon warehouse or a third party individual but “amber” refil looks a mess. Not to mention it isn’t the same size in depth as the “warm silk” I also ordered. I will be returning both and making the trip up to a plastic surgeons office to make sure I am buying a fresh “real” Jane iredale product. If there is an explanation as to why this happened I am happy to hear about this. Sorry... but the photos don’t lie.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Grafton

customer_reviews.title: This powder with a good primer underneath replaces foundation and concealer with excellent coverage ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a long time user of JI products, and this powder never fails! For all the hundreds I've spent on foundation and powders, this affordable powder blows away all of the pricier competitions. I have ice pick scarring, discoloration, and wrinkles....This powder with a good primer underneath replaces foundation and concealer with excellent coverage that wears well while looking a lot more natural than other products. The new refillable compacts to put them in however are cheap and not worth it. I wish they would bring back the burnished metal cases!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Used for 15 years and still my favorite Pressed Powder
customer_reviews.text: Everything about Jane Iredale cosmetics is amazing! Their pressed powder works true miracles! It is given to patients who recently has face lifts or chemical peels by their Cosmrtic Surgeons, I used it as a teenager suffering from acne and I use it as an adult to highlight my fantastic 35 year old skin! 😘 covers everything, goes on smoothly, blends naturally, easy to find a matching colors!
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: BEST EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down, the BEST pressed powder foundation I have ever used. I have been using for years, and will die using this stuff. It covers up anything and makes your skin look flawless.
customer_reviews.author: GlowMyStars

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, but when I got it today it was missing the pressed power all together!? I only got the pad. I was hoping to have it for rehearsal dinner and now I won't..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this makeup
customer_reviews.text: Love this makeup. I sometimes work very long hours (14 hrs) for events and this doesn't clog my pores and make me break out. The color is great, I am a light brown/tan color and it is hard to find makeup that matches our skin tones. It has good coverage, not too heavy and not too light. I was actually told about from my dermatologist when I got contact dermatitis and it covered the temporary marks very well without making it look caked on. However it is also light enough because now that my skin is clear I still wear it, just less of it.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Longtime user of Golden Glow
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this powder for about five years, after my dermatologist recommended it. Every so often I will stray, but then I will come back to it ... It's lightweight, medium coverage (though you can keep applying to get more coverage) and doesn't irritate my face. It also doesn't cake up on me. It's a great everyday powder and you don't need anything under it (i usually just use moisturizer and concealer under my eyes). In my opinion, it's worth the price ... but then again, I have a drawer of failed makeup powders and products, and would rather spend more money on something I know I like.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I'm shocked by the amount of great reviews for this product. Granted I don't have other pressed powder foundations to compare it to but as far as foundation goes I don't like it. It's very matte/dry looking. It doesn't cover very well and it makes my pores more apparent than other foundations I've used. The pad it comes with is flimsy and the makeup doesn't apply smoothly so the combination of the two makes putting it on harder than it should be. Also, I used their color finder and man it was off. The color I got makes me look so pale. Definitely returning it.
customer_reviews.author: C. E. Wright

customer_reviews.title: This product is easy to apply if you know how to apply it
customer_reviews.text: I've used Iredale for years. THE only foundation that really works for my oily, break-out prone skin. This is the real thing too ( I've bought from other unauthorized dealers and it wasn't real product). This product is easy to apply if you know how to apply it. FYI: with the pressed powder use a flat tipped brush like their Handy Brush. Apply to face in downward strokes,Not in circles as this will "polish" the minerals and give too much shine.You get better finish from straight, downward stokes. I also love that it is a physical sunscreen vs a chemical sunscreen.
customer_reviews.author: Becky R

customer_reviews.title: Best foundation I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect foundation. PERFECT. I did get a slightly darker color for the summer, normally I wear warm sienna. I've used this foundation for 13 years. GREAT product. I strayed recently and tried a different line of foundation for "mature skin" that has that super-glisten-ey look. Yuck. I was back to the Jane Iredale within a couple of weeks. It stays right where you put it until you take it off... but, it's easy to remove despite the durability of it.
customer_reviews.author: PhyllisJL

customer_reviews.title: Love.. but
customer_reviews.text: Really like this product. However, the last 4 I've now ordered completely fall apart after a week or two of use. This never happened when I purchased it locally when living in CA. I now live in FL and its very hard to find here, so I've had to order. Sadly, I have ended up putting it in a snack size zip lock in it's very powdery form when it falls apart. Unclear as to why this keeps happening. This happened when I had one sent to Hawaii and MN while there on my vaca's, so it isn't climate related.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Gates

customer_reviews.title: Acne prone skin and LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I have suffered with breakouts since I was about 10. I am now 21 and have moved into "adult acne". As you can imagine, I have always been covering my face trying to reduce redness. I have tried powders in the past but this is by far the best. I have recently changed my regimen so my skin is improving, but this makeup does not interfere or clog up pores like other brands have. I think this powder is actually helping my skin! Feels and looks lightweight so I am not a cake face :)
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Pineda

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Have purchased this brand before in spas and liked it. I took the foundation color match quiz on their website and then ordered this color on Amazon and it was a good match with no issues for color. I have sensitive rosacea prone skin and this didn't cause any breakouts, however the fact that it is mineral-based means it does have a little bit of the glimmery look to it. Which if you have any scars on your face this will highlight those. It's expensive for foundation especially for just a refill compact, but it's a good quality product from a good name brand and appears to be the real deal and not a knock off or dupe.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Received an EMPTY case
customer_reviews.text: Soooo my order arrived with no pressed powder. Just an empty case with a sponge.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.O

customer_reviews.title: Makeup Junkie Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: As a long time makeup wearer, it was difficult to switch from liquid foundation to a mineral pressed powder. The drugstore liquid matte foundation i have been addicted to, was drying out my skin. After switching to Jane Iredale's pressed powder foundation, my skin feels and looks so much healthier! I was worried it wouldn't be enough coverage for my large pores, but you can layer it, as needed, and it gives you a really nice smooth, matte, yet healthy glow to your skin. It doesn't look or feel like you have makeup on at all. I am a new fan, and will continue to use it. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: lisayogaangel

customer_reviews.title: perfect everyday makeup
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this makeup for about 3 years. I originally bought it at Pharmaca and had a esthetician help me pick the shade. I've been using Warm Silk ever since. I always get compliments on how natural it looks. Really buildable coverage. It's a bit expensive but I feel comfortable wearing it everyday with any level of eye makeup or just by itself for going on a hike. I sunburn easily but as long as I'm not in direct sun for long periods of time, the spf in this is great. I love this product and buy more as soon as I run low.
customer_reviews.author: Emily M.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mineral makeup for easily blemished skin
customer_reviews.text: The BEST mineral makeup available! I used bareminerals for years and finally realized I needed a change. I was turned onto the Jane Iredale line and would never go back! The pressed powder has wonderful, seamless coverage and when used with the hydration sprats from Jane Iredale, will stay put all day. I like to spritz some hydration spray throughout the day to keep it in place and to keep my skin moisturized and this stuff stays all day! It's very light and friendly to my skin. I breakout very easily and this stuff has actually helped improve my skin. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Is it important to buy from an Authorized Dealer?
customer_reviews.text: I have only ordered this product from "Jane Iredale authorized dealers" in the past. In my opinion, the quality is lacking when ordering from Amazon. The color and coverage are both different. It doesn't stay on my skin as long. It's also more expensive on Amazon. I will only buy from authorized dealers from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Julianna

customer_reviews.title: Nice product but colors are off
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin and have been using this product for about 3 weeks. I haven’t had any issues and I really like the coverage. My only complaint is the colors are so light. I’m always a light/medium so that’s what I originally purchased, Satin. It made me look very pale so I purchased medium (suntan), it’s better but still light on me. I tried returning the Satin but unfortunately they do not accept returns. I really like the product but their colors are off.
customer_reviews.author: Azappie

customer_reviews.title: it is good coverage, but you need to buy the flat ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using jane iredale makeup for years...I get many compliments...it is good coverage, but you need to buy the flat compact brush recommended as that way it covers correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy D Rydell

customer_reviews.title: Love Jane
customer_reviews.text: I love this product but without fail everytime I buy a refill within a day the powder shatters and then its loose not pressed and I have to put it in a container so it doesn't spill everywhere. But...for the quality of the product going on your skin, ehh, I'll deal with it. I've been told it's the only makeup endorsed by the American cancer society. Love the brand, except the mascara.
customer_reviews.author: cafiregirl

customer_reviews.title: Unsealed product.... update!
customer_reviews.text: This product is clearly not new. It’s not sealed. This product was just opened and taken out of the package. I love Jane iredale and have used it for a long time. I will not be using an unsealed product. UPDATE! My new product was delivered promptly by a very nice lady. The product was sealed and in excellent condition. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Karen haas

customer_reviews.title: good coverage
customer_reviews.text: my favorite powder make-up. Lots of shades to choose from and when you need to go up or down a shade you can choose one that is not so drastically different. I gave it 4 stars on presentation only because the refill does come securely placed in the plastic. I wish the container was prettier because the compact to put it in is too expensive to buy one each time I need to change shades.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I think I finally found the perfect makeup for my skin. I've always had oily skin and breakouts, and at 55 years old it hasn't changed a whole lot. My skin is pretty fair and also sensitive. The coverage makes it a perfect foundation and it stays matte pretty much all day. The exception is if I'm out in the heat during the day, but I live in Houston so pretty much everything melts from your face if you're outside during the summer. So easy to apply and much less mess than a liquid foundation. Doesn't cake up like liquid foundations do for me. All in all, just a great product. It's pricey, but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie 52

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Doesn't make me break out. I even went back to my old foundation to see if it really made a difference and I broke out again. If you are really unsure about your shade call jane iredale customer service. They sent me a free tiny sample to try since I don't live close to a location.
customer_reviews.author: Ericka

customer_reviews.title: SUPERIOR PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I have used this Jane Iredale product now for 6 years. Once introduced to it I fell in love with the appearance it gives your skin. Does not flake or look drying on the skin. Use with the stamping brush (bought separately) and stipple it onto your face with this brush. It leaves no residue and makes your skin look like porcelain. Just make sure you get the right color shade for your skin. I am fair skin and this works great.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Valentino

customer_reviews.title: Great colors and zero allergic reactions
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this foundation for years. It goes on well and had build able coverage. I would say this is a medium coverage. I have sensitive skin and this does not irritate at all. I apply with a large powder foundation brush. Sometimes I wear it alone or over Tarte Amazon Clay foundation for more full coverage and set with Urban Decay Deslick. All the Jane Iredale makeup products are lovely. Also use their blush and lipsticks. Great colors and zero allergic reactions.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan P Hilden

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: My skin is old, getting wrinkles, sun spots and still has oily patches. This addresses all of those issues and makes me feel confident all day long. Not heavy at all, I can touch up in the afternoon without washing my face. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Feels healthy and there's actually a lot of product there...
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a very thin disk of expensive product--BUT--it's densely packed and lasts a long time. Goes on smoothly and doesn't feel like a chemical mask covering my skin (as other products). Feels healthy and I'm feeling a longterm commitment in the making...still don't like the price tho.
customer_reviews.author: dogsbody

customer_reviews.title: This is a good match for the suntan left after skin has finished ...
customer_reviews.text: This shade of fawn is darker with more red than the fawn I've bought before. The original fawn worked more for an olive complexion. This is a good match for the suntan left after skin has finished peeling from a sunburn.
customer_reviews.author: ss

customer_reviews.title: Airbrushed look and good for your skin
customer_reviews.text: I love this pressed powder foundation. It leaves my face looking airbrushed and not cakey at all. It's also great for your skin. My esthetician recommended this brand to me and told me that although you shouldn't, you could sleep in this makeup. It's fantastic. I had the color tested at my esthetician's office so I didn't blindly pick a color online, so I'm not sure which color I would have picked without seeing it first. I wear "Suntan" and I'm fairly light. It's a great product and I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JenniH

customer_reviews.title: Huge fan of this powder.
customer_reviews.text: This product is a game changer, in my opinion. The powder feels light but provides pretty full coverage, even over pores or imperfections. I wear this powder daily without other foundation; just moisturizer or primer underneath and achieve very lasting coverage for a full day's wear. I have used this during summer months as well as winter months. I will repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Concerned Citizen

customer_reviews.title: Great powder makeup!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I found this makeup 15 years ago and still very satisfied with it. I don't have to fuss with liquid foundation and finishing powder. This dual compact is fast and efficient and works very well. I will continue to use it for the rest of my life!!
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Never going back to cheaper products
customer_reviews.text: I love Jane Iredale mineral powder! I've been buying and using it for over 8 years. My friend who is an Esthetician in La Jolla, CA got me started on it before my wedding. Now I'm addicted and have never looked back. I apply it once in the morning and if I'm going out somewhere after work, then once more although its not terribly necessary. I would absolutely recommend Jane Iradale products. It covers nicely, doesn't feel thick or cakey and leaves your skin smooth and shine-free.
customer_reviews.author: Addy's mom

customer_reviews.title: Only makeup I can use
customer_reviews.text: This is the ONLY makeup I can use for my acne-prone skin. Never breaks me out. You can use a fluffy brush and apply it lightly or you can apply it heavily for good coverage. It does tend to accentuate wrinkles, so I mist with water after applying.
customer_reviews.author: Reader700

customer_reviews.title: This actually deserves 10 stars
customer_reviews.text: The absolute best powder foundation ever. Period. I apply it with a damp beauty blender and it looks so amazing. I use it as a setting powder for liquid foundation and alone. It’s really buildable and the finish is pretty versatile so you can basically make it how you want it to look.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley Brown

customer_reviews.title: Love Jane Iredale: One Bad Apple ?
customer_reviews.text: Although I absolutely love Jane Iredale- This one I believe to either have gone bad or a fake somehow. This was my first time purchasing this item via Amazon back in January 2017. It is now August 2017, so I have been able to thoroughly test it. This product, in general, has always looked lovely, but this specific item has been awful. I was hoping it was just my brush or moisturizer or primer or what have you. Moving forward, I will just be buying from the spa or online.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Mineral Powder
customer_reviews.text: This is the best mineral makeup I've used. It lasts all day. I have very sensitive skin, and there is an ingredient (I don't remember what it is specifically) that causes my skin to somewhat tingle in a negative way. It is the only product I've found, however, that really covers up under-eye circles without creasing or being too heavy so as to cause sagging. For those without sensitive skin, it's fabulous.
customer_reviews.author: Ronice Bevan

customer_reviews.title: I love Jane Iredale products!
customer_reviews.text: I discovered Jane Iredale at my dermatologist's office. Pressed base gives the most natural coverage! I use the JI blush as well. I often get compliments on how healthy my skin appears. It's a little more expensive than many products but well worth it. In ordering it through Amazon as opposed to JI website I have never had a problem with the quality. This is top of the line make up!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: I'm over 70 years old and I like the way the base looks on my skin
customer_reviews.text: I've used Jane Iredale PurePressed Base for about 3 years now. I'm over 70 years old and I like the way the base looks on my skin. It covers spots ok but not completely which is fine by me. Anything heavier would cause creases or wrinkles to show more abundantly.
customer_reviews.author: Diane McAllister

customer_reviews.title: Not happy!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 latte pressed powder foundation and the outer packaging says latte but I just opened them to use today and it says light beige on actual product. I have used this product for years and lives it. That’s $80 down the drain because I see return date was July 9th. Not happy! I would select a zero for stars but not an option.
customer_reviews.author: julie  Groesbeck

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Press Powder
customer_reviews.text: Was very happy to find this product on Amazon. I've been using this press powder for years not. I have acne scars and rosacea, this really blends well covers with or without a concealer. I also have allergies and have never had an issue with any Jane Iredale products. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hoffmann

customer_reviews.title: In love with this foundation
customer_reviews.text: In love with this foundation. After using MAC liquid foundation for years I was very hesistant to try something new and I really wish I would have sooner! My MAC used to look cakey..the application of this foundation is so smooth and looks great and gives you a nice glow. I'm very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy T

customer_reviews.title: BEST.
customer_reviews.text: BEST foundation I've ever used. Worth the price! Color matches perfectly and covers all day. Looks very natural! Some things you spend a little extra on because you just can't go back to cheap stuff that doesn't work nearly as well, THIS is one of those products.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Color is different, poor value for refill only!
customer_reviews.text: Beware, this is only a refill. The picture shows a product container, very misleading (and bad value!). Also, color Is obviously different (lighter) from my last purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Maier

customer_reviews.title: Breaking up with an old fav....
customer_reviews.text: I've used Jane Iredale PurePressed Base in the Suntan shade for years but this refill seemed a lot lighter than what I'm used to using. In addition and most unfortunately, it broke into pieces when I traveled with it in my luggage.... A $40 disappointment and mess!
customer_reviews.author: Silly1

customer_reviews.title: Simply the Best!
customer_reviews.text: Jane Iredale makes the best makeup I have experienced. Buying it on Amazon has been great because they don't seem to keep my color stocked in the spa here in town. I am sensitive to a lot of chemically made products an this has never caused any problems. It is build-able coverage if you need but starts off as light.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Lou S

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this make-up!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this base pressed powder for eight years at least. I love it so much. I have very sensitive skin that can break out easily. It has been on of the only products that doesn't effect my skin negatively. I love the natural look and can barely feel that it's on. I get lots of compliments on my make-up too! I love that I can order it on Amazon and even get a bit of a discount. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: amymarie483

customer_reviews.title: Crumble cake
customer_reviews.text: What is going on? I've bought this for years and the last three keep breaking apart. I don't take them any where. They stay on top my counter at home. I never had this proplem 10,+ years!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Christensen

customer_reviews.title: The absolute best brand
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this powder foundation for over 20 years & it’s still my favorite! Sunscreen, foundation & powder all in one! Can’t get any better than that.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Wade

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this foundation! Only one I use now and I feel like I've tried 100's of brands and formulations. Goes on super easy (I use a makeup brush to apply), covers really well (even my mild melasma) and does not irritate my skin. All of that is worth the price tag for me. I use the "Warm Sienna" color and if I feel it is too light for summer I just warm it up by applying bronzer on top. (Easier than ordering 2 colors...1 for summer & 1 for winter).
customer_reviews.author: CherylB

customer_reviews.title: SPF and great coverage. Daily use and still lasts for months before reordering
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this foundation. The powder covers and stays all day. One great product feature; SPF 20. I use this foundation every day and it lasts for months. Excellent quality and coverage. I love Jane Iredale products. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Prudence Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Powder  (for reals!!)
customer_reviews.text: This is a brilliantly covering pressed powder that leaves a natural and lovely finish. I’ve been using it for about 10 years and I wouldn’t even consider using something else.
customer_reviews.author: McGadek

customer_reviews.title: Pale skin beware
customer_reviews.text: I like this powder a lot. Unfortunately I'm as pale as casper and none of the powders they have available are light enough. This is close, but still leaves my skin a light yellow / orange. In the summer when I slightly tan, it's rather close to my skin, but not quite. Since it's winter, I've become rather pale again, so this won't cut. I have one on reserve for the summer if need be, I just wish this came in a lighter shade for us fair skinned people.
customer_reviews.author: BabyStego

customer_reviews.title: So annoying. You should know the difference between pressed and ...
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this item two times and both times I received the loose powder in place of the pressed powder. So annoying. You should know the difference between pressed and loose as well as read the box before sending. There is a big difference.
customer_reviews.author: O.R._RN 15

customer_reviews.title: Best mineral base I've tried from many
customer_reviews.text: No better mineral base out there and I've tried many. Really pricey, true, but these last for a long time and the pressed format means it isn't messy and travels well. I have 3 different shades as depending on the season my skin shade goes from very pale to just a bit less than pale and these blend well with no shimmer so they look natural. The sun protection is very good and this does not irritate my sensitive skin at all.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Coverage - Easy to Apply
customer_reviews.text: I had been using Larenim but they discontinued my color. I MUCH prefer this. Stays put all day. Very pleased. This is my second order.
customer_reviews.author: Tyson

customer_reviews.title: The compact is now plastic instead of metal. Not good!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Jane Iredale for over 20 years it’s amazing the down fall is that the compact is now plastic shame on them!
customer_reviews.author: IVETTE IMMO

customer_reviews.title: Color and Not heavy !
customer_reviews.text: Jane Iredale has a good selection of colors to suit a variety of skin coloring. Goes on easily and looks very natural. Has sunscreen ! I love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Proud Grandma

customer_reviews.title: This product works amazing!
customer_reviews.text: My sister who is an RN said that they always recommend Jane Iredale makeup to their patients for any redness of scars or marks after they have had surgery. I have a small patch of Rosacia on my face and was complaining that nothing seems to cover it, not powder or liquid foundation. She took me to a business that sold Jane Iredale products. They chose the "Radiant" shade for my skin tone and she applied the makeup on me right there and it covered it immediately. I was sold right there. I have been using it ever since! It is a must have in my household!
customer_reviews.author: BK - Walled Lake, MI

customer_reviews.title: Love this powder
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for my fountain for years. Love that it is lightweight yet covers well. I use the setting spray as well. Love Jane Iredale cosmetics.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Killian

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff!!! Introduced to this miracle at some makeup class I was duped into. NOTHING covers dark circles better. No idea that a powder foundation could have such drastic coverage abilities! The real deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the best foundation.. Holy Grail
customer_reviews.text: I love Jane Iredale pressed base mineral foundation and have recommended it to many friends. First off, I would definitely recommend using a kabuki style brush to apply it for more coverage (and tap off excess) if you do this, it provides great coverage, and this is coming from someone with freckles, hyperpigmentation etc. All I use is sunscreen under this, my JI pressed powder and then a little concealer where I need it more (under eyes, around nose etc) It evens out my skin, looks very natural, and never breaks me out. I would highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: MBrooks425

customer_reviews.title: Just as pictured!
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly the same as the ones I've purchased at aesthetician's office before. Works great as a mineral base or over liquid foundation. I actually prefer the look I get when applying it to bare skin w/the flocked sponge.
customer_reviews.author: katherine johnson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Match for Foundation
customer_reviews.text: I wish it came with the case, but I have two cases already - just know - this is just the product, no case.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever Pressed Powder
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for about 10 years. Great soft appearance, doesn't highlight lines, and does not dry out my skin, nor clog pores, like other products. Actually helps protect my face from sun damage. I only use my day moisturizer and Jane Iredale Pressed Powder. Hold the liquid foundation, you won't need it with this pressed powder. Tried a couple of other brands of powder (loose & pressed), that were less expensive, but could not get the same soft look, plus they did not have SPF 20.
customer_reviews.author: 4theDogz

customer_reviews.title: Great makeup for cystic acne prone sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: It seems I can only use a few brands of makeup on my super sensitive cystic acne prone skin, Jane Iredale and Suki. But since Suki stopped making that particular line/shade of liquid foundation I stick with Jane Iredale. I'm in my mid 40-'s, over 20 years of dealing with my skin, I'm thankful for Jane Iredale. It is not complete coverage, but my skin can breathe, doesn't cause breakouts, evens skin tone, I find in the winter (Chicago) applying with a brush is not the best option for me. A damp (not the disposable cheap stinky kind) makeup sponge works best. Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: chitownegrl

customer_reviews.title: Powder Foundation and Concealer
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and I don’t like wearing a lot of makeup anymore but it is a great way to get my face and skin tone looking great and I have had tried many others.
customer_reviews.author: NJersey

customer_reviews.title: Isn’t the best at covering active blemishes
customer_reviews.text: I definitely evens out my complexion some. Isn’t the best at covering active blemishes, but covered hyperpigemtation and scars. I have oily skin and somehow it still manages to dry the crap out of my face. That’s the reason it’s getting lower stars. It will make any active blemish crack, which only highlights the fact you have one.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Kilpatrick

customer_reviews.title: yes!
customer_reviews.text: If you haven't tried mineral make-up, you are in for a really nice surprise. I started using it when I was going through chemotherapy and had to be careful of opportunistic infections. This stuff is great. Amazing coverage. Very easy and fast to use. Looks GREAT - and looks very natural. It's also pretty waterproof/sweatproof, which comes in handy at times. I am very fair, blonde/blue-eyed and use bisque as my foundation and ivory as a concealer.
customer_reviews.author: midwestgirl

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I discovered this foundation years ago, after reading Kat James' The Truth About Beauty. It is pure, clean, natural, & very good makeup. This is the only mineral makeup I've found that doesn't make your pores look huge. I love that it provides such a high UV protection. This is definitely on my list of absolute essentials.
customer_reviews.author: Pearly

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage
customer_reviews.text: Shows dry skin though and sometimes lays on top of moisturizer in an unflattering way. If I don't moisturize and am fully exfoliated it gives me a flawless finish.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Mom

customer_reviews.title: No liquid foundation needed
customer_reviews.text: Great coverage. I don’t have bad acne, but some discoloration and occasional red spots/pimples. I can always get away with just using the pressed power and not needing any liquid foundation. It covers very nicely and evens out the skin color on my entire face.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gives you such a beautiful light coverage
customer_reviews.text: This has become my everyday face make up. Gives you such a beautiful light coverage. Takes away all my red, shows hardly any imprections once covered. I have oily skin, this holds up for 6-8 hrs without showing my oil.
customer_reviews.author: MariaJ

customer_reviews.title: ... worn this makeup for 6+ years and it's the best. I've tried others just to see if there ...
customer_reviews.text: EDIT***** 5/13/16 Today I received an EMPTY compact! I paid for 1 day shipping to rush this item needed for a vacation and now I am literally without my makeup! Ridiculous. Done buying this product from Amazon. It's way more reliable/consistent at the spa. I've worn this makeup for 6+ years and it's the best. I've tried others just to see if there was something I would love more and I always return to Jane Iredale. It's great for your skin and covers blemishes easily while looking natural.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla W.

customer_reviews.title: Even for 60+/ it's the best product
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for a while/ it's the best I've found for my skin
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia L.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful base
customer_reviews.text: I found this wonderful makeup in a boutique in st Augustine. I love it. My skin is oily and spotty. This takes care of the oil and my spots. I am very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Reese

customer_reviews.title: Nice coverage, my skin can breathe.
customer_reviews.text: Love this foundation. Have used it for about 4 years. Covers well, never looks fake or cakey.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite face powder
customer_reviews.text: My favorite face powder. I've been using this for years. Natural coverage that doesn't cause breakouts. I'm in my 50's and I don't want a cover that sinks into wrinkles or is so heavy it gives a bondo like appearance. I use a concealer brush to add a Little more powder to areas that need more attention. My dermatologist commented on how naturally the imperfections (small veins) on my face were hidden.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Tallman

customer_reviews.title: Natural looking.
customer_reviews.text: I love the Jane Iredale products. It looks good on my skin, it looks very natural. I also like the fact that it has SPF of 20
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia E Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The only make up my daughter will use. Good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: The best I’ve tried...
customer_reviews.text: Great. Best foundation I’ve tried in 20 years of using it. Use the Jane Iredale brush, and top with a hydration spray. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Maria R

customer_reviews.title: love this powder
customer_reviews.text: love this powder, it's amazing but what's a real problem for me is that it breaks into tiny pieces and goes everywhere, even when in a compact and the compact is closed.when I open the lid powder goes everywhere. this is expensive, I hate to think how much i'm pay for powder that goes everywhere instead of where it belongs. I would get my money back if I could. this is the second compact I've purchased so it's not a fluke
customer_reviews.author: Nora Daly

customer_reviews.title: Only thing I’ll use! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I’m an esthetician and Jane is all I use. The pressed powder is full coverage and doesn’t cause breakouts or make you oily.
customer_reviews.author: Jazmyn

customer_reviews.title: Great Coverage
customer_reviews.text: My dermatologist recommend this foundation, I love it, great coverage!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Powder for any age
customer_reviews.text: I have used this powder as a finishing touch to my makeup for years and love it. It doesn't cake or change color all day long. I started using it in my 40's and am still using it in my 70's!
customer_reviews.author: Linda R.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect face powder
customer_reviews.text: I love this powder - the color and weight/ sheerness is perfect. Plus is has an SPF of 25! It doesn’t cause breakouts and doesn’t dry my face out.
customer_reviews.author: Oh-Nana

customer_reviews.title: I love Jane Iredale!
customer_reviews.text: Received on time and colour was great. I've been using Jane Iredale make up for over a decade but just started purchasing it from Amazon. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: modN1

customer_reviews.title: Great quality but hefty price
customer_reviews.text: I love this foundation. Jane Iredale is crazy expensive though so I try to not use this every day. They have great quality cosmetics though, just very expensive.
customer_reviews.author: J. Diehl

customer_reviews.title: Just what I expected and have been using for quite some time
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this brand and shade for about a year. It works well over my foundation but I can't wear it solo due to my skin needing a base or just looks flaky. One of these lasts quite a long time. I wouldn't have had to order this one so soon but I dropped my other and 'oops' it cracked to pieces. I would definitely recommend any Jane Iredale products.
customer_reviews.author: Kblain

customer_reviews.title: I havr used jane iredale golden glow for many years ...
customer_reviews.text: I havr used jane iredale golden glow for many years. This one is so thin of product and it was very noticeable. I have a new one of another color that was a mistake and I forgot to send back. It's is twice the product of the new one. Giess I should order directly from jane iredale. This is a pricey product. May have to find another brand.
customer_reviews.author: S. o'brien

customer_reviews.title: Jane Iredale PurePressed Base
customer_reviews.text: I am somewhat of a makeup maven and have tried many brands of foundation, from drugstore brand to high end. I always come back to Jane Iredale PurePressed Base. It blurs my imperfections, e.g. larger pores and discoloration from years of tanning. It goes on quickly, offers medium coverage but is buildable. As the day wears on and my skin oils begin to show a bit, Jane Iredale PurePressed Base lets my skin glow rather than show oily patches.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Powder!
customer_reviews.text: I really LOVE Iredale products. My skin is really dry and sensitive. This powder did not irritate or clog it up my face at all. I would definitely purchase again. I would probably purchase directly from Iredale, just to be sure you are getting the authentic brand and the price is same.
customer_reviews.author: Laura H

customer_reviews.title: No breakouts!
customer_reviews.text: Jane Iredale is the only makeup that does not break me out since I developed adult onset cystic acne almost four years ago. I have tried many high end brands that ended up making my skin worse. Do yourself a favor and buy Jane Iredale. I had similar problems finding a concealer that did not break me out. JI's circle delete is also great and my skin loves it.
customer_reviews.author: CFB

customer_reviews.title: This is the best makeup I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: This is the best makeup I have ever used. The coverage is great and it doesnt clog my pores or irritate my sensitive skin. The powder will break inside the holder very easily so unless you want your pressed powder to turn into a loose powder handle with care. Will definitely buy again and again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: I’m very angry. This is just a refill. It did not state that. I would return this item but due to being high risk for contracting covid-19 I can’t go in anywhere. I will be contacting whomever I can to get satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly A. Curlee

customer_reviews.title: You'll get addicted
customer_reviews.text: I've gotten two of these from my dermatology office but the qualities are really bad, the thing dries up in a week, as if it's not that "fresh". Since then I've been ordering from Amazon and the quality I get from here is just consistently fabulous and longlasting - my brushes love it and my face love it. I don't use liquid foundation anymore. This gives me a more natural look as if I have really good skin.
customer_reviews.author: JZ

customer_reviews.title: The best pressed powder ever
customer_reviews.text: The best pressed powder ever. I only wish it came with a compact. The JI compacts are cheaply made and super expensive. I just use it out of the plastic box it came in.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Only Jane Iredale for my face!
customer_reviews.text: Love her products. It's all I use. Great coverage without heaviness. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Cosmogirl

customer_reviews.title: my one and only foundation for the last 13 years ...
customer_reviews.text: my one and only foundation for the last 13 years! pricey, but it lasts almost a year, and is worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: mrshendough

product_meta.title: jane iredale PurePressed Base, Mineral Pressed Powder with SPF, Matte Foundation, Vegan, Clean, Cruelty-Free
product_meta.description:
Color:Golden GlowA pressed mineral foundation that is slightly more sheer and matte than the loose powders. An SPF foundation, powder and concealer with broad spectrum (UVA/UVB) sun protection. Either SPF 20 or SPF 15 depending on shade.* Water resistant to 40 minutes. Oil free and weightless. Contains antioxidants such as Pine Bark Extract and Pomegranate Extract (a potent antioxidant that aids in minimizing UV damage). Goes well with our Refillable Compact. Reef safe. *SPF 20 - shades: Amber; Autumn; Bisque; Caramel; Fawn; Golden Glow; Golden Tan; Honey Bronze; Ivory; Latte; Light Beige; Natural; Radiant; Riviera; Satin; Suntan; Sweet Honey; Teakwood; Warm Sienna; Warm Silk *SPF 15 - shades: Cognac; Velvet; Mahogany; Bittersweet; Cocoa; Warm Brown

BRAND STORY
jane iredale is a comprehensive line of mineral makeup developed to enhance the lives of women by delivering personal, natural beauty to lift her health and spirit.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
